'''''About Me'''''

|- | valign="top" style="background:#FFFFFF; border:2px solid black;" | Hi! I am Thomas, 16 yrs old from Athens, greece. I read Tolkien since i was 5 and i find his work fantastic. I also draw images from Sillmarilion. I may upload them some time... At the moment my primary goal is to improve the "music" section of the Tolkien Gateway, especially the [[Bands]] category. I have also uploaded various images, taken from the net, dvd and modified by me. |- | |- | colspan="2" style="background:#EEDC82; border:2px solid black; color:#990066; text-align:center;" |
